description:
Shimada Arisu is the commander of the http://anidb.net/ch82620 [Daigaku Senbatsu Team]. She`s a young prodigy who skipped grades to reach university despite her young age. She is the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch87665 [Shimada Chiyo], the master of the Shimada style, a rival to the Nishizumi house. She`s also a fan of Boko, like http://anidb.net/ch44859 [Nishizumi Miho], and accepts to fight against http://anidb.net/ch51571 [Ooarai] if her mother, in the case of a win, becomes the sponsor of the Boko Museum, which is about to close because of lack of funding.
Source: Wikia
name: Shimada Arisu
